wikipedia_page.main: John Michael Squire was professor of structural biophysics in the University of London, a visiting professor at Imperial College London and a research fellow at the University of Bristol, where he researched muscle contraction and blood vessel glycocalyx structure.  He was a Fellow of both the Institute of Physics and the Society of Biology.  He was an emeritus member of the US Biophysical Society and an honorary member of the British Biophysical Society.
